body:
See subject.

### Expected Result

Either an error during install, or a working install, not a "successful" install of an incompatible binary.

### Actual Result

An incompatible binary.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ # log in to a ppc64le system
$ spack install cuda
$ spack install hwloc+cuda # this will fail to load cuda, because it's the wrong arch
...
```
title: cuda package blindly installs x86_64 regardless of current arch
